name: Garfield (itch)
description:
Playable 3D simulation of this   classic handheld electronic game including views of the original packaging and instruction guide . A RetroFab simulation Version 0.9 (Beta) Details Title Garfield Series Handheld Manufacturer Konami Inc. Release Date 1991 Screen Liquid Crystal Display Chipset Sharp SM511 ( 32.768 kHz ) Description

In this 1991 handheld LCD game developed by Konami, Odie's gotten Garfield into another fine mess! That pea-brained pooch has gone and got himself marooned on the moon! And nothing alarms Garfield more, except maybe an alarm clock! With your help, Garfield's got to rescue him.

Gameplay

For starters, press the On/Start switch. The screen will display the high score. Now it's time to think fast, because in this topsy turvy world it's raining flower pots, old boots, garbage can lids and rotten tomatoes. Steer clear, or it'll be goodbye kitty. But keep an eye out for the chicken because Odie will drop you a few roasted pieces to help you out. Eat 'em up and get some life back. Every bit of life is precious because contrary to popular belief, this cat's only got FOUR lives.

Watch out for good old Jon who will appear occasionally with a hot steamy pan of lasagna. When you see him, move all the way left towards him with the GO GARFIELD button (WASD or arrow keys), then press left to chow down. Get stuffed enough with three servings of lasagna and you'll fill your SUPER JUMP Meter. When (and only when) your meter is filled, you can press the POUNCE button (CTRL or Enter) and it's bang zoom to the moon to rescue Odie from his lunar lounge. Save Odie and you'll move up to a higher level. All 6 levels get tougher as you go, so you'll have to be quick on the button.
